017package org.microbean.invoke;
018
019import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
020
021import java.lang.invoke.ConstantCallSite;
022import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle;
023import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles;
024import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles.Lookup;
025import java.lang.invoke.MethodType;
026
027import java.util.Collection;
028import java.util.Collections;
029import java.util.Comparator;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.SortedMap;
032import java.util.SortedSet;
033import java.util.TreeMap;
034import java.util.TreeSet;
035
036/**
037 * Useful constant bootstrap methods and methods that make sense to
038 * invoke from {@link
039 * java.lang.invoke.ConstantBootstraps#invoke(Lookup, String, Class,
040 * MethodHandle, Object...)}.
041 *
042 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
043 *
044 * @see <a
045 * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html"
046 * target="_parent"><code>java.lang.invoke</code></a>
047 */
048public final class BootstrapMethods {
049
050
051  /*
052   * Constructors.
053   */
054
055
056  private BootstrapMethods() {
057    super();
058  }
059
060
061  /*
062   * public static methods.
063   */
064
065
066  public static final ConstantCallSite findStaticSetterCallSite(final Lookup lookup,
067                                                                final String fieldName,
068                                                                final MethodType methodType,
069                                                                final Class<?> targetClass)
070    throws Throwable {
071    return new ConstantCallSite(findStaticSetterMethodHandle(lookup, fieldName, methodType.parameterType(0), targetClass));
072  }
073
074  public static final ConstantCallSite findStaticCallSiteAsSpreader(final Lookup lookup,
075                                                                    final String methodName,
076                                                                    final MethodType methodType,
077                                                                    final Class<?> targetClass)
078    throws Throwable {
079    return new ConstantCallSite(findStaticMethodHandle(lookup, methodName, methodType, targetClass)
080                                .asSpreader(Object[].class, methodType.parameterCount()));
081  }
082
083  public static final ConstantCallSite findSetterCallSite(final Lookup lookup,
084                                                          final String fieldName,
085                                                          final MethodType methodType,
086                                                          final Class<?> targetClass)
087    throws Throwable {
088    return new ConstantCallSite(findSetterMethodHandle(lookup, fieldName, methodType.parameterType(0), targetClass));
089  }
090
091  public static final ConstantCallSite findVirtualCallSite(final Lookup lookup,
092                                                           final String methodName,
093                                                           final MethodType methodType,
094                                                           final Class<?> targetClass)
095    throws Throwable {
096    return new ConstantCallSite(findVirtualMethodHandle(lookup, methodName, methodType, targetClass));
097  }
098
099  public static final ConstantCallSite findConstructorCallSite(final Lookup lookup,
100                                                               final String ignoredMethodName,
101                                                               final MethodType methodType,
102                                                               final Class<?> targetClass)
103    throws Throwable {
104    return new ConstantCallSite(findConstructorMethodHandle(lookup, methodType, targetClass));
105  }
106
107  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
108  public static final <K, V> SortedMap<K, V> immutableSortedMapOf(final Map<? extends K, ? extends V> map,
109                                                                  final Comparator<? super K> comparator) {
110    final SortedMap<K, V> mutableSortedMap;
111    if (comparator == null) {
112      if (map instanceof SortedMap) {
113        mutableSortedMap = (SortedMap<K, V>)map;
114      } else {
115        mutableSortedMap = new TreeMap<>(map);
116      }
117    } else {
118      mutableSortedMap = new TreeMap<>(comparator);
119      mutableSortedMap.putAll(map);
120    }
121    return Collections.unmodifiableSortedMap(mutableSortedMap);
122  }
123
124  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
125  public static final <E> SortedSet<E> immutableSortedSetOf(final Collection<? extends E> set,
126                                                            final Comparator<? super E> comparator) {
127    final SortedSet<E> mutableSortedSet;
128    if (comparator == null) {
129      if (set instanceof SortedSet) {
130        mutableSortedSet = (SortedSet<E>)set;
131      } else {
132        mutableSortedSet = new TreeSet<>(set);
133      }
134    } else {
135      mutableSortedSet = new TreeSet<>(comparator);
136      mutableSortedSet.addAll(set);
137    }
138    return Collections.unmodifiableSortedSet(mutableSortedSet);
139  }
140
141
142  /*
143   * private static methods.
144   */
145
146
147  private static final MethodHandle findStaticMethodHandle(final Lookup lookup,
148                                                           final String methodName,
149                                                           final MethodType methodType,
150                                                           final Class<?> targetClass)
151    throws Throwable {
152    return MethodHandles.privateLookupIn(targetClass, lookup).findStatic(targetClass, methodName, methodType);
153  }
154
155  private static final MethodHandle findStaticSetterMethodHandle(final Lookup lookup,
156                                                                 final String fieldName,
157                                                                 final Class<?> fieldType,
158                                                                 final Class<?> targetClass)
159    throws Throwable {
160    return
161      MethodHandles.privateLookupIn(targetClass, lookup).findStaticSetter(targetClass, fieldName, fieldType);
162  }
163
164  private static final MethodHandle findSetterMethodHandle(final Lookup lookup,
165                                                           final String fieldName,
166                                                           final Class<?> fieldType,
167                                                           final Class<?> targetClass)
168    throws Throwable {
169    return
170      MethodHandles.privateLookupIn(targetClass, lookup).findSetter(targetClass, fieldName, fieldType);
171  }
172
173  private static final MethodHandle findVirtualMethodHandle(final Lookup lookup,
174                                                            final String methodName,
175                                                            final MethodType methodType,
176                                                            final Class<?> targetClass)
177    throws Throwable {
178    return MethodHandles.privateLookupIn(targetClass, lookup).findVirtual(targetClass, methodName, methodType);
179  }
180
181  private static final MethodHandle findConstructorMethodHandle(final Lookup lookup,
182                                                                final MethodType methodType,
183                                                                final Class<?> targetClass)
184    throws Throwable {
185    if (void.class != methodType.returnType()) {
186      throw new IllegalArgumentException("void.class != methodType.returnType(); methodType: " + methodType);
187    }
188    return MethodHandles.privateLookupIn(targetClass, lookup).findConstructor(targetClass, methodType);
189  }
190
191
192}
